abstract: This word has appeared in 975 New York Times articles in the past year.
snippet: This word has appeared in 975 New York Times articles in the past year.
lead_paragraph: 1. the act of determining the properties of something, usually by research or calculation2. the quality of being determined to do or achieve something; firmness of purpose3. a position or opinion or judgment reached after consideration4. deciding or controlling something's outcome or nature5. the act of making up your mind about something
